metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6105 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the multiple devicesfunctionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A specially crafted f2fsfilesystem can cause Information overwrite resulting in a code execution.An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
